item.title: 非洲银行希望在 2028 年之前上市，推迟退出中央银行的时间
item.description: 非洲银行有限公司（African Bank Ltd.）十年前被南非央行拯救，由于尚未完成上市准备工作，该公司计划于 2025 年上市的时间推迟了三年。【原文：African Bank Ltd., rescued by South Africa’s central bank a decade ago, delayed its planned listing in 2025 by three years as it’s yet to complete preparations to take the company public.】

item.title: 加拿大央行称，通货紧缩无法解决负担能力危机
item.description: 加拿大央行的一位官员表示，决策者的目标是将通胀率保持在 2% 的目标附近，并反驳了官员们应进一步放缓物价涨幅或导致通货紧缩的观点。【原文：A Bank of Canada official said policymakers aim to keep inflation near their 2% target, and pushed back on the idea that officials should slow price gains further or cause deflation.】

item.title: 尼日利亚再次提高利率以抑制高通胀
item.description: 尼日利亚中央银行今年连续第六次提高利率，加大力度抑制不断飙升的通货膨胀，并支撑受创的奈拉。【原文：The Central Bank of Nigeria raised interest rates for the sixth straight time this year, intensifying its quest to curb surging inflation and support the battered naira.】

item.title: 家乐福道歉以平息法国-巴西肉类争端
item.description: 家乐福公司（Carrefour SA）曾表示不会在法国销售南美肉类，现在已向巴西公开道歉，以解决与巴西政府和农民之间的危机。【原文：Carrefour SA has issued a public apology to Brazil to settle a crisis with its government and farmers, after having said the company would not sell South American meat in France.】

item.title: 芝加哥市长努力为负债累累的城市寻找税收解决方案
item.description: 芝加哥市长布兰登-约翰逊（Brandon Johnson）有五周时间通过预算，以填补该市近 10 亿美元的赤字。时间紧迫，资金也是如此。【原文：Chicago Mayor Brandon Johnson has five weeks to pass a budget that fills the city’s nearly $1 billion deficit. Time is short, and so is the money.】

item.title: 安哥拉称不会就国际货币基金组织可能的新贷款计划进行谈判
item.description: 安哥拉说，目前没有与国际货币基金组织就可能的新财政援助计划进行谈判。【原文：Angola said there are currently no negotiations taking place with the International Monetary Fund about a possible new financial-assistance program.】

item.title: 西班牙期待大型私募股权交易启动 IPO 市场
item.description: 银行家们寄希望于几家大型私募股权公司的上市，以重振明年西班牙的首次公开募股市场，而最近几个月有几家候选公司推迟了上市计划，原因是市场形势严峻。【原文：Bankers are pinning their hopes on a few large private equity-backed listings to rekindle Spain’s IPO market next year, after several candidates postponed plans to go public in recent months blaming tough market conditions.】

item.title: 万事达基金会通过巨额 PE 交易进入二级市场
item.description: 今年私募股权二级市场最大的一笔交易标志着一家新的大型机构投资者的到来。【原文：One of the biggest purchases this year in the private equity secondaries market marks the arrival of a major new institutional investor.】

item.title: 当石油走私者躲藏起来时，追踪者必须变得更加聪明
item.description:
受制裁原油的装运者正在采用更加复杂的策略来掩盖他们的活动。【原文：

Shippers of sanctioned crude are adopting more sophisticated tactics to cover up their activities.

】

item.title: 华尔街优步牛人汤姆-李（Tom Lee）在 ETF 时代做出下一个大胆赌注
item.description: 华尔街的预言家们往往抱团取暖，不敢出头，生怕出错。这就是汤姆-李。【原文：Wall Street prognosticators tend to huddle around the consensus, afraid to stand out for fear of being wrong. Then there’s Tom Lee.】

item.title: 德意志银行吸引担心交易风险的德国商业银行客户
item.description: 德意志银行（Deutsche Bank AG）的一位高管表示，在意大利联合信贷银行（UniCredit SpA）可能被收购的不确定性下，德国商业银行（Commerzbank AG）的客户正越来越多地向其主要国内竞争对手寻求资金。【原文：Clients of Germany’s Commerzbank AG are looking increasingly to its main domestic competitor to secure funding amid the uncertainty over a potential takeover by UniCredit SpA, a senior executive at Deutsche Bank AG said.】

item.title: 欧洲央行麦考尔称部分私人信贷公司呈现 "系统性 "特征
item.description: 欧洲中央银行的一位高级官员说，个别私人信贷公司已经变得如此庞大，以至于可以影响到更广泛的金融体系的状况。【原文：A top European Central Bank official said individual private credit firms have become so big that they can affect the state of the wider financial system.】

item.title: 路威酩轩集团旗下轩尼诗公司暂停将干邑装入大桶运往中国的计划
item.description: 上周，法国 LVMH 集团旗下品牌轩尼诗的工人举行罢工抗议，随后轩尼诗放弃了在中国装瓶干邑以规避关税的测试。【原文：Hennessy backed down from a test of bottling Cognac in China as a way around tariffs after workers at the LVMH label in France went on strike last week in protest.】

item.title: 索尼收购动漫出版商机遇大于风险
item.description: 索尼集团公司（Sony Group Corp. ）正在酝酿日本娱乐业历史上最大的收购案之一。但首先...【原文：Sony Group Corp. is flirting with one of the biggest takeovers in the history of Japan’s storied entertainment sector. But first...】

item.title: 生命医疗集团通过南非医院建设增加支出
item.description: 生命医疗集团控股有限公司（Life Healthcare Group Holdings Ltd.）宣布派发特别股息，并预留 26 亿兰特（1.44 亿美元）用于增加和改善其南非本土市场的医院。【原文：Life Healthcare Group Holdings Ltd. declared a special dividend and set aside 2.6 billion rand ($144 million) for adding and improving hospitals in its home market of South Africa.】

item.title: 软件入场，芯片退场，交易员为特朗普时代做好准备
item.description: 在过去的一个月里，科技投资者发生了翻天覆地的变化：软件股炙手可热，而半导体制造商却乏人问津。【原文：There’s been a sea change among tech investors during the past month: Software stocks are hot, while semiconductor makers are not.】

item.title: 美国 "临时工经济 "保持稳定，并未蓬勃发展
item.description: 我是塞西尔-道拉特（Cécile Daurat），美国经济学编辑。今天我们关注的是 "打工经济"。请将反馈和建议发送至 ecodaily@bloomberg.net，或通过 @economics 在 X 上与我们联系。如果您还没有注册，请点击这里。【原文：I’m Cécile Daurat, an economics editor in the US. item.title: 特朗普对华关税威胁助推中国出口创新高
item.description: 美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普威胁要对来自中国的所有商品征收 10%的额外关税，以惩罚中国没有兑现对芬太尼毒贩判处死刑的承诺。【原文：President-elect Donald Trump is threatening to impose 10% additional tariffs on all goods from China to punish the nation for not following through on promises to institute the death penalty for traffickers of fentanyl.】

item.title: VinFast亏损收窄，收入因电动汽车销量增加而跃升
item.description: VinFast 汽车有限公司称，由于交付了更多汽车，该公司第三季度亏损缩小，收入增加。【原文：VinFast Auto Ltd. said its third-quarter loss narrowed and revenue jumped as the company delivered more cars.】

item.title: 蓝天（Bluesky）称将遵守欧盟规则
item.description: 在欧盟指责快速增长的社交媒体平台藐视其数字法规后，Bluesky 表示正在努力遵守欧盟的规定。【原文：Bluesky said it’s working to comply with European Union rules after the bloc accused the fast-growing social media platform of flouting its digital regulations.】

item.title: OpenAI、Meta 和 Orange 用非洲语言训练人工智能模型
item.description: OpenAI 和 Meta Platforms 公司将开始用非洲语言训练人工智能程序，以解决非洲大陆数千种方言模型短缺的问题。【原文：OpenAI and Meta Platforms Inc. will begin training artificial intelligence programs on African languages, addressing a shortage of models for the continent’s thousands of dialects.】

item.title: Monzo 在可能的 IPO 前聘用前巴克莱银行和努比亚银行高管
item.description: Monzo Bank Ltd.已聘请巴西努班克银行（Nubank）前高管汤姆-奥尔德姆（Tom Oldham）担任首席财务官，这家数字金融公司正在为可能的首次公开募股做准备。【原文：Monzo Bank Ltd. has hired Tom Oldham, a former executive at Brazil’s Nubank, as chief financial officer as the digital finance firm prepares for a possible initial public offering.】

item.title: 伊拉克、俄罗斯和沙特在欧佩克+会议前讨论能源市场问题
item.description: 来自伊拉克、俄罗斯和沙特阿拉伯（欧佩克+联盟中最大的三个国家）的官员在巴格达举行会议，讨论能源市场问题。【原文：Officials from Iraq, Russia and Saudi Arabia — three of the biggest nations in the OPEC+ alliance — met in Baghdad to discuss energy markets days before the group’s year-end gathering.】

item.title: 关税人 "卷土重来，成为推动全球市场的力量
item.description: 贝森特反弹 "并没有持续太久。就在市场欢呼特朗普的财政部长人选对华尔街有利，甚至有可能驯服苛刻关税威胁的一天之后，即将上任的总统提醒大家谁才是老大。特朗普认为有必要征收关税，以打击跨境流动的移民和非法毒品，市场反应迅速。加元跌至四年来的最低点。墨西哥比索跌至 2022 年以来最弱。【原文：The “Bessent Bounce” didn't last long. Just one day after markets cheered Trump’s pick for Treasury secretary as a Wall Street-friendly choice, someone that might even tame the threats of harsh tariffs — the incoming president reminded everyone who the boss is. Trump cast the tariffs as necessary to clamp down on migrants and illegal drugs flowing across borders, and the market reaction was swift. The Canadian dollar dropped to a four-year low. The Mexican peso sank to its weakest since 2022.Whi】

item.title: 韦丹塔计划向沙特铜矿项目投资 20 亿美元
item.description: 韦丹塔公司（Vedanta）将投资 20 亿美元在沙特阿拉伯建设铜加工设施，这将极大地推动沙特阿拉伯成为全球金属和矿业中心的雄心。【原文：Vedanta is set to invest $2 billion to build copper-processing facilities in Saudi Arabia, a significant boost for the kingdom’s ambitions to become a global metals and mining hub.】

item.title: 欧洲两家炼油厂开始建厂生产合成油
item.description: 道达尔能源公司（TotalEnergies SE）和 OMV 股份公司（OMV AG）即将启动利用废塑料制造合成油的工厂，以减少化学品生产过程中的排放。【原文：TotalEnergies SE and OMV AG are close to starting up plants that will make synthetic oil from waste plastic to cut emissions in the production of chemicals.】

item.title: 英国将考虑进一步放宽伦敦银行家奖金规定
item.description: 英国将考虑放弃对银行家奖金的更多限制，因为英国正在想方设法提高自己在全球金融舞台上的竞争力。【原文：The UK will consider ditching more restrictions on banker bonuses as the country looks for ways to become more competitive on the global financial stage.】

item.title: 视频游戏机制造商面对性能天花板
item.description: 人眼其实无法分辨 4K 和 8K 分辨率之间的差别。【原文：The human eye can’t really tell the difference between 4K and 8K resolution.】

item.title: 前中国银行董事长被判死刑，缓期执行
item.description: 中国以受贿罪判处中国银行股份有限公司前董事长刘连舸死刑，缓期执行。前中国银行董事长刘连舸因受贿罪被判处死缓，标志着对中国价值 66 万亿美元的金融业的审查力度加大。【原文：China handed a suspended death sentence to former Bank of China Ltd. Chairman Liu Liange over bribery, marking heightened scrutiny over the nation’s $66 trillion financial sector.】

item.title: 欧洲期货交易所计划在 2025 年推出欧盟债券期货
item.description: 欧洲期货交易所（Eurex Clearing AG）计划明年推出欧盟债务债券期货，与竞争对手洲际交易所（Intercontinental Exchange Inc.【原文：Eurex Clearing AG plans to launch bond futures for the European Union’s debt next year, joining its rival Intercontinental Exchange Inc. in the race to provide liquidity to what has become one of the region’s biggest issuers.】
